titan_pylib.io.fast_o のソースコード

 1import os
 2from __pypy__.builders import StringBuilder
 3


[ドキュメント]
 4class FastO():
 5
 6  sb = StringBuilder()
 7


[ドキュメント]
 8  @classmethod
 9  def write(cls, *args, sep: str=' ', end: str='\n', flush: bool=False) -> None:
10    append = cls.sb.append
11    for i in range(len(args)-1):
12      append(str(args[i]))
13      append(sep)
14    if args:
15      append(str(args[-1]))
16    append(end)
17    if flush:
18      cls.flush()


19


[ドキュメント]
20  @classmethod
21  def flush(cls) -> None:
22    os.write(1, cls.sb.build().encode())
23    cls.sb = StringBuilder()
